title: Beetroot, Red Apple And Watercress Salad
summary: Beetroot, Red Apple And Watercress Salad might be just the side dish you are searching for. This recipe makes 1 servings with 463 calories, 10g of protein, and 18g of fat each. For $6.01 per serving, this recipe covers 42% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free and dairy free diet. This recipe is liked by 33 foodies and cooks. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 10 minutes. A mixture of apples, rocket, an of marjoram, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so scrumptious. With a spoonacular score of 99%, this dish is great.
